title: Theodore Roosevelt National Park: Family Fun Packs
body: Family Fun Packs         Family Fun Packs are filled with guidebooks, activities, and more.   Borrow a Family Fun Pack for the day! The pack includes field guides, binoculars, hand lenses, and activities to help families enhance their visit and sense of discovery. Family Fun Packs are available at the South Unit and North Unit Visitor Centers. Packs are available for a 24-hour loan. Bring a valid photo ID and credit card. There is no charge for this service.
